abstract.t: This memorandum describes how the HIP control packets can be used tosend requests for preferred certificates to the correspondent hosts,and also requests for a Certification Authority (CA) to issue acertificate. The document specifies two new HIP parameters CERT_REQand CERT_SIGN_REQ and describes their use. The means as to how tosignal an error in case of the desired certificate is not availableis also discussed. The syntax of certificates and certificaterequests is out of scope of the document and defined elsewhere.
